location.description: Gets or sets the location of the resource.

tags.description: Gets or sets the tags attached to the resource.

operatingSystem.description: Gets or sets the operating system this extension supports.

computeRole.description: Gets or sets the type of role (IaaS or PaaS) this extension supports.

handlerSchema.description: Gets or sets the schema defined by publisher, where extension consumers should provide settings in a matching schema.

vmScaleSetEnabled.description: Gets or sets whether the extension can be used on xRP VMScaleSets.By default existing extensions are usable on scalesets, but there might be cases where a publisher wants to explicitly indicate the extension is only enabled for CRP VMs but not VMSS.

supportsMultipleExtensions.description: Gets or sets whether the handler can support multiple extensions.

type.description: Gets or sets the type of the extension handler.

autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Gets or sets whether the extension handler should be automatically upgraded across minor versions.

settings.description: Gets or sets Json formatted public settings for the extension.

instanceView.description: Gets or sets the virtual machine extension instance view.

destinationContainerName.description: Gets or sets the destination container name.

overwriteVhds.description: Gets or sets whether it overwrites destination VirtualHardDisk if true, in case of conflict.

name.description: Gets or sets the plan ID.

publisher.description: Gets or sets the publisher ID.

product.description: Gets or sets the offer ID.

promotionCode.description: Gets or sets the promotion code.

publisher.description: Gets or sets the image publisher.

offer.description: Gets or sets the image offer.

sku.description: Gets or sets the image sku.

version.description: Gets or sets the image version. The allowed formats are Major.Minor.Build or 'latest'. Major, Minor and Build being decimal numbers. Specify 'latest' to use the latest version of image.

uri.description: Gets or sets the virtual hard disk's uri. It should be a valid Uri to a virtual hard disk.

VirtualHardDisk.description: Describes the uri of a disk.

osType.description: Gets or sets the Operating System type.

name.description: Gets or sets the disk name.

vhd.description: Gets or sets the Virtual Hard Disk.

image.description: Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

caching.description: Gets or sets the caching type.

createOption.description: Gets or sets the create option.

lun.description: Gets or sets the logical unit number.

diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the disk size in GB for a blank data disk to be created.

name.description: Gets or sets the disk name.

vhd.description: Gets or sets the Virtual Hard Disk.

image.description: Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

caching.description: Gets or sets the caching type.

createOption.description: Gets or sets the create option.

imageReference.description: Gets or sets the image reference.

osDisk.description: Gets or sets the OS disk.

dataDisks.description: Gets or sets the data disks.

passName.description: Gets or sets the pass name. Currently, the only allowable value is oobeSystem.

componentName.description: Gets or sets the component name. Currently, the only allowable value is Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup.

settingName.description: Gets or sets setting name (e.g. FirstLogonCommands, AutoLogon )

content.description: Gets or sets XML formatted content that is added to the unattend.xml file in the specified pass and component.The XML must be less than 4 KB and must include the root element for the setting or feature that is being inserted.

AdditionalUnattendContent.description: Gets or sets additional XML formatted information that can be included in the Unattend.xml file, which is used by Windows Setup. Contents are defined by setting name, component name, and the pass in which the content is a applied.

protocol.description: Gets or sets the Protocol used by WinRM listener. Currently only Http and Https are supported.

certificateUrl.description: Gets or sets the Certificate URL in KMS for Https listeners. Should be null for Http listeners.

WinRMListener.description: Describes Protocol and thumbprint of Windows Remote Management listener

listeners.description: Gets or sets the list of Windows Remote Management listeners

WinRMConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Remote Management configuration of the VM

provisionVMAgent.description: Gets or sets whether VM Agent should be provisioned on the Virtual Machine.

enableAutomaticUpdates.description: Gets or sets whether Windows updates are automatically installed on the VM

timeZone.description: Gets or sets the Time Zone of the VM

additionalUnattendContent.description: Gets or sets the additional base-64 encoded XML formatted information that can be included in the Unattend.xml file.

winRM.description: Gets or sets the Windows Remote Management configuration of the VM

WindowsConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Configuration of the OS Profile.

path.description: Gets or sets the full path on the created VM where SSH public key is stored. If the file already exists, the specified key is appended to the file.

keyData.description: Gets or sets Certificate public key used to authenticate with VM through SSH.The certificate must be in Pem format with or without headers.

SshPublicKey.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key and the path on the Linux VM where the public key is placed.

publicKeys.description: Gets or sets the list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs

SshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux based VMs running on Azure

disablePasswordAuthentication.description: Gets or sets whether Authentication using user name and password is allowed or not

ssh.description: Gets or sets the SSH configuration for linux VMs

LinuxConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Configuration of the OS Profile.

certificateUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL referencing a secret in a Key Vault which contains a properly formatted certificate.

certificateStore.description: Gets or sets the Certificate store in LocalMachine to add the certificate to on Windows, leave empty on Linux.

VaultCertificate.description: Describes a single certificate reference in a Key Vault, and where the certificate should reside on the VM.

sourceVault.description: Gets or sets the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing all of the certificates in VaultCertificates.

vaultCertificates.description: Gets or sets the list of key vault references in SourceVault which contain certificates

VaultSecretGroup.description: Describes a set of certificates which are all in the same Key Vault.

computerName.description: Gets or sets the computer name.

adminUsername.description: Gets or sets the admin user name.

adminPassword.description: Gets or sets the admin user password.

customData.description: Gets or sets a base-64 encoded string of custom data.

linuxConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the Linux Configuration of the OS profile.

secrets.description: Gets or sets the List of certificates for addition to the VM.

primary.description: Gets or sets whether this is a primary NIC on a virtual machine

networkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets the network interfaces.

resources.description: Gets the virtual machine child extension resources.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
